mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ty_sms_send_report (id, msg_id,mobile, arrived_status, arrived_time, arrived_result_message, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{msgId},#{mobile}, #{arrivedStatus}, #{arrivedTime}, #{arrivedResultMessage}, now(), now())

INSERT INTO ty_sms_send_report (id, msg_id,mobile, arrived_status, arrived_time, arrived_result_message, create_date, update_date) VALUES
(#{repo.id}, #{repo.msgId},#{mobile}, #{repo.arrivedStatus}, #{repo.arrivedTime}, #{repo.arrivedResultMessage}, now(), now())
